event.name: newmet
event.description: Event indicating change in meteorological data

event.name: prepare
event.description: Start of daily simulation time step

event.name: post
event.description: End of daily simulation time step

ApsimToSim.sim: [outputfile.filename] [foreach outputfile.outputfiledescription as desc][foreach desc.events][foreach events.event as e][if "[e.eventname]" = "Daily"]post[elseif "[e.module]" = "global"][e.eventname][else][e.name][endif] [endfor][endfor][endfor] [foreach outputfile.outputfiledescription as desc] [foreach desc.variables as vars] [foreach vars.variable as var] [if "[var.module]" = "global"] [var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name] [elseif "[var.VariableType]" = "Water"] [var.module] Water.[var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name] [elseif "[var.VariableType]" = "Nitrogen"] [var.module] Nitrogen.[var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name] [else] [var.module].[var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name] [endif] [endfor] [endfor] [endfor]

variable.name: irr_fasw
variable.description: Irrigation fraction of available soil water (0-1)

variable.name: irr_deficit
variable.description: Water deficit within the critical irrigation soil depth (mm)

fertiliser.Description: The fertiliser module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to apply fertiliser."

variable.name: flow_water
variable.description: Water flow from each layer - layered(mm)

variable.name: flow_no3
variable.description: N flow out of each layer - layered (kg/ha)

variable.name: dm_feed_on_offer
variable.description: Dry matter of feed on offer (kg/ha)

ApsimToSim.sim:
[foreach manager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition]
[condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor]
[endfor] [endfor]

tclmanager.SimMacro: [comment] ################ manager ################ [endcomment] <component name="tclmanager" executable="%apsuite\apsim\tcllink\lib\tcllink.dll"> <initdata> <master>yes</master> <rules> [foreach tclmanager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition] <rule name="[rule.name] - [condition.name]" condition="[condition.name]"> [condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor] </rule> [endfor] [endfor] </rules> </initdata> </component>

farmmanager.SimMacro: [comment] ################ manager ################ [endcomment] <component name="tclmanager" executable="%apsuite\apsim\tcllink\lib\tcllink.dll"> <initdata> <master>yes</master> <rules> [foreach farmmanager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition] <rule name="[rule.name] - [condition.name]" condition="[condition.name]"> [condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor] </rule> [endfor] [endfor] </rules> </initdata> </component>

paddockmanager.SimMacro: [comment] ################ manager ################ [endcomment] <component name="[area.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\tcllink\lib\tcllink.dll"> <initdata> <master>no</master> <rules> [foreach paddockmanager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition] <rule name="[rule.name] - [condition.name]" condition="[condition.name]"> [condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor] </rule> [endfor] [endfor] </rules> </initdata> </component>

variable.name: surfaceom_wt
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic materials

variable.name: surfaceom_c
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic carbon

variable.name: surfaceom_n
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic nitrogen

variable.name: surfaceom_p
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic phosphor

variable.name: surfaceom_cover
variable.description: Fraction of ground covered by all surface OM"s

variable.name: surfaceom_c1_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in "xxxx" in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_c2_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in "xxxx" in fpool2

variable.name: surfaceom_c3_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in "xxxx" in fpool3

variable.name: surfaceom_n1_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in "xxxx" in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_n2_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in "xxxx" in fpool2

variable.name: surfaceom_n3_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in "xxxx" in fpool3

variable.name: surfaceom_p1_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic phosphorous in "xxxx" in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_p2_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic phosphorous in "xxxx" in fpool2

variable.name: surfaceom_p3_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic phosphorous in "xxxx" in fpool3

variable.name: standing_fr_xxxx
variable.description: Fraction of "xxxx" which is inert, ie not in contact with the ground

variable.name: cnrf_xxxx
variable.description: C:N ratio factor for decomposition for "xxxx"

variable.name: vpd_estimation
variable.description: vpd_estimation: What Grasp used for daily VPD

variable.name: growth_transp
variable.description: growth_transp: Potential growth by mass flow

variable.name: death_water
variable.description: death_water; Leaf death by water stress

variable.name: death_water_stem
variable.description: death_w_stem: Stem death by water stress

variable.name: wso
variable.description: Dry weight of storage organs kg/ha

variable.name: wlvg
variable.description: Dry weight of green leaves kg/ha

variable.name: wlvd
variable.description: Dry weight of dead leaves kg/ha

variable.name: hu
variable.description: Daily heat units effective for phenological development (oCd d-1)

variable.name: lrstrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor causing leaf rolling

variable.name: ldstrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor accelerating leaf death !-

variable.name: lestrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor reducing leaf expansion !-

variable.name: pcew
variable.description: Effect of drought stress on daily total gross CO2 assimilation of crop; reduction in potential transpiration rate !-

variable.name: tnsoil
variable.description: Daily amount of N available for uptake from soil !kg N ha-1 d-1

variable.name: nflv
variable.description: Nitrogen fraction in leaves on leaf area basis !g N m-2 leaf

variable.name: fnlv
variable.description: Fraction of N in leaves on weight basis !kg N kg-1 DM

variable.name: nacr
variable.description: Actual nitrogen uptake rate by crop !kg N ha-1 d-1

variable.name: ancr
variable.description: Amount of N in crop (live and dead material) !kg N ha-1

variable.name: anso
variable.description: Amount of N in storage organs !kg N ha-1

variable.name: anlv
variable.description: Amount of N in leaves !kg N ha-1

variable.name: rnstrs
variable.description: Reduction factor on relative leaf growth rate caused by N stress !-

variable.name: dtga
variable.description: Daily total gross CO2 assimilation of crop !kg CO2 ha-1 d-1

variable.name: gcr
variable.description: Gross growth rate of crop !kg DM ha-1 d-1

variable.name: ssga
variable.description: Specific green stem area !ha stem kg-1 stem

variable.name: eff
variable.description: Initial light-use efficiency (kg CO2 ha-1 leaf h-1)(W m-2 leaf )-1

variable.name: etrd
variable.description: Radiation-driven part of reference evapotranspiration rate !mm d-1

variable.name: etae
variable.description: Dryness-driven part of reference evapotranspiration rate !mm d-1

variable.name: trc
variable.description: Potential transpiration rate of crop with given LAI !mm d-1

variable.description: Sugar root length density for each layer (mm/mm3)

variable.description: Sugar total N in biomass (green + trash) (g/m2)

variable.description: Sugar N concentration in green leaf (g/g)

variable.name: tlai
variable.description: Sugar total leaf area index (green and senesced)

variable.name: sw_demand
variable.description: Sugar crop demand for water (potential uptake) (mm)

variable.name: nfact_photo
variable.description: Sugar Nitrogen stress factor on photosynthesis (0-1)

variable.name: nfact_expan
variable.description: Sugar Nitrogen stress factor on cell expansion (0-1)

variable.name: swdef_pheno
variable.description: Sugar water stress factor on phenology (0-1)

variable.name: swdef_photo
variable.description: Sugar water stress factor on photosynthesis (0-1)

variable.name: swdef_expan
variable.description: Sugar water stress factor on cell expansion (0-1)

variable.name: ep
variable.description: Sugar daily crop water uptake, Ep (mm)

variable.description: Status of crop: alive, dead or out

variable.name: radn_cover
variable.description: Cover used in radiation interception equation

variable.name: sw_pot
variable.description: Potential water uptake from the sward (mm)

variable.name: death_water_leaf
variable.description: Death of leaf by water stress (kg/ha)

variable.description: Death of leaf by phenological process (age) (kg/ha)

variable.description: Death of leaf by phenological process (age) (kg/ha)

variable.name: rad_index
variable.description: Index of radiation (ie lack of) stress (0-1)

variable.name: temp_index
variable.description: Photosynthetic reduction factor for temperature stress (0-1)

variable.name: growth_index
variable.description: Product of temperature, radiation & SW indices ()

variable.name: maxlayer_salt
variable.description: soil layer in which max_salt occurs

venlink.Documentation: ../apsim/venlink/docs/Guide to linking APSIM with the VENSIM.htm

egrandis.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

variable.name: adm_green
variable.description: E. grandis Live Above-ground Biomass Pools

variable.name: adm_dead
variable.description: E. grandis Dead Above-ground Biomass Pools

variable.name: adm_sen
variable.description: E. grandis Senesced Above-ground Biomass Pools

stream.Description: The stream module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to track stream flow in a spatial simulation."

root.Description: The Root module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to use the spatial root system capability in APSIM."

spaceslurp.Description: The Spatial slurp module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to use the spatial root system capability in APSIM."

climatechange.Description: This component allows the user to apply modifiers to daily climate variables in order to investigate the effects of climate change.

sim.rule: !change met data to reflect climate change met.maxt = met.maxt + [cc.maxtmodifier] met.mint = met.mint + [cc.mintmodifier] met.rain = met.rain * [cc.rainmodifier] met.radn = met.radn * [cc.radiationmodifier]

soi.Description: This component allows the user to add SOI phases to a simulation. These phases can then be used in manager logic.
